name: Timepiece Town
description: This is a very small town - more of a trading post, really. A few shops for basic things, and one store that'll deal with adventurers. In an empty, disused building a giant spiderweb spells out "SOOM MOON".

shops.name: Timepiece Adventurer Emporium
shops.description: Despite the grandiose name, this is a small shop with a few basic adventuring supplies and items.
